ewcommand{\Mee}[9]{ egin{bmatrix} #1 & #2 & #3  r #4 & #5 & #6  r #7 & #8 & #9 \end{bmatrix}}$ Definition: Natural Numbers $\N$ The set of all positive integers ${1, 2, 3, …}$ are natural numbers, denoted by $\N$.
